programme.title: GAADI - Children Of The Sun
programme.desc: Stripped of her Radala cast and forcibly married to an outcast by the monarch, a woman fights to keep her dignity by rejecting to succumb to her destiny.

programme.title: Helen Dorn: After The Storm
programme.desc: After a celebration in her rural hometown, Karla Petersen is murdered on her way home. Inspector Helen Dorn takes on the case but clashes with local officer Tom Petersen, Karla's brother, who defies warnings to find his sister's killer.

programme.title: ASIA
programme.desc: Motherhood has not been easy for Asia, a single mother whose teenage daughter, Vika, barely interacts with her. But when Vika’s health deteriorates rapidly, Asia must step in and become the mother Vika so desperately needs.

programme.title: M.U.R.B.Y.
programme.desc: In a world where dogs transform into formidable wolves by consuming feathers, Rob, driven by ambition, steals coveted M.U.R.B.Y feathers. However, a gust of wind serves as a twist of fate which sends him on a soul-searching journey of moral dilemmas.

programme.title: Cryptid Hunter
programme.desc: A mockumentary about a passionate monster enthusiast’s search for elusive cryptids like ‘Bigfoot‘ or ‘Nessie‘. However, no matter how hard he tries to find them, he never seems to be able to spot any, even if they were right in front of his very eyes.

programme.title: Lucky Girl
programme.desc: TV star Nina Sokil is diagnosed with bone cancer, but deeming her career to be more important with her health, Nina goes to absurd lengths to hide her condition so that she keeps working.

programme.title: The Boy Who Wants To Live
programme.desc: 70-year-old Willi catches Malian refugee Nama stealing, but decides not to report him. Having been a refugee once, Willi sees a part of himself in Nama, and brings him home. However, Nama’s decision further frays his relationship with his son.

programme.title: Helen Dorn: Breathless
programme.desc: In an illegal arms case, three men, including two policemen, are dead. Mattheisen reveals a radical right-wing conspiracy, and suspects a mole. However, he is shot dead with Inspector Dorn’s weapon, while Dorn is found at the crime scene with no memory.

programme.title: Heavenly Nomadic
programme.desc: A family of nomads dwelling high in the mountains of Kyrgyzstan doesn't need any of the conveniences of modern civilization in order to be happy. But progress is creeping into their lives regardless, destroying legends and traditions as it comes.

programme.title: The Little Comrade
programme.desc: During Stalinist tyranny, 6-year-old Leelo’s mother is sent to a prison camp. Haunted by her mother’s last words telling her to be a good kid, Leelo vows to be on her best behaviour in the hope that it will bring her mother back.

programme.title: The Inland Road
programme.desc: After surviving a car crash when running away from home, Tia finds herself having nowhere to go. Seeking out the family of the crash victim, she moves in with them and threatens to upend the family’s delicate balance.

programme.title: Murder by the Lake - Procession
programme.desc: Marlene Stöhr is shot by a crossbow during the legendary “blood procession” with over 3000 horses and is on life support. Right before she was shot, she saw a precious racehorse presumed dead years ago. Two detectives are called to investigate.

programme.title: Once Upon A Time In Calcutta
programme.desc: Having just lost her daughter and disillusioned with her marriage, Ela decides to start an independent life of her own. Unable to secure a housing loan, she uses her boss, the owner of a ponzi scheme, to get what she wants.

programme.title: A River Within
programme.desc: Five women with their own personal struggles travel to the Orange River for their “Adventure Therapy”. When things go awry in their river rafting adventure, their survival instincts kick in forcing them to dig deep.

programme.title: GAADI - Children Of The Sun
programme.desc: Stripped of her Radala cast and forcibly married to an outcast by the monarch, a woman fights to keep her dignity by rejecting to succumb to her destiny.

programme.title: Angpao
programme.desc: Michael competes with his brother to get the most Angpaos for Chinese New Year but is one-upped by his brother who received extras from a mysterious man. To beat his rival, Michael must find a way to get Angpaos from the mysterious man too.

programme.title: Celeste
programme.desc: Living in the lush rainforest of Northern Queensland, a retired opera diva prepares for one final performance. Her late husband's son Jack arrives, haunted by the past, only to discover that Celeste has one last request for him.

programme.title: The Deep
programme.desc: March 1984, a few miles off the south coast of Iceland, a fishing boat sank with all its men. One of the crew members miraculously survived. After six hours in the ocean, the exhausted man is washed ashore, only to find himself on a deadly lava field.

programme.title: Hoarders S12 - EP 2
programme.desc: A reality-TV show that features compulsive hoarders--people who are addicted to filling their homes with objects--and how that spills out into their lives.

programme.title: The Wall UK S4 - EP 8
programme.desc: The Wall is a wildly unpredictable, fast and simple game show with huge cash sums on the line. Two players must work together to tackle the mammoth four-storey-high wall. Emotions run high as the pair's faith in one another is tested by unpredictable outcomes and ever-rising stakes. The rules are simple. If the players answer a trivia question correctly, the ball turns green as it falls randomly down the wall towards slots of varying cash amounts.

programme.title: Don't Forget the Lyrics USA S6 - EP 7
programme.desc: The hit music game show is back! Just like in the original version, one contestant must attempt to sing through and fill in the missing lyrics to TEN of the biggest hit songs of all time! But when the music stops, the contestant must correctly provide the missing song lyrics. If a contestant can successfully make it through the first 9 songs without missing a SINGLE lyric, they'll have the chance to play a 10th and final song for a shot at ONE MILLION DOLLARS!

programme.title: Hungry For It - EP 3
programme.desc: Ten amateur chefs embark on the ultimate crash course in their bid to break into the restaurant business and win the culinary trip of a lifetime. At the end of the series, the winning cook enjoys a round-the-world trip working in some of the industry's most renowned restaurants. The cooks' mentors are grime artist and TV cook Big Zuu, and Kayla Greer, a private chef from LA whose clients includes the singer Justin Bieber.

programme.title: Remarkable Places to Eat S2 - EP 1
programme.desc: In the second series of Remarkable Places To Eat, Britain's best loved foodies take host Fred Sirieix to experience their favourite restaurants and explore what goes into making them so special. Series highlights include a visit to Marrakesh with Andi Oliver, exploring the delights of Vienna with Rachel Khoo and a road trip around Yorkshire with Nadiya Hussain.

programme.title: The Earthshot Prize: Repairing of Our Planet - EP 1
programme.desc: An ambitious and important series focused around the Earthshot initiative to save our increasingly fragile planet. This is a critical decade for Earth. Facing up to the urgent need to fix our climate, restore nature and build a waste-free world can feel overwhelming. This pioneering series, fronted by Prince William and his team of high-profile champions, explores these simple but ambitious Earthshots - five goals crucial to the survival of our precious planet, and to lifeitself.

programme.title: Supa Strikas - EP 3
programme.desc: (Dual Language - English and Malay) Follow Shakes, Rasta and the rest of the Supa Strikas on their quest to become the world's greatest football team!

programme.title: Beyblade X - EP 28
programme.desc: (Dual Language - English and Malay) An XTREME start to the biggest new series of Beyblade! Beyblade pros from around the world gather to compete in the Pro League held inside the X Tower!

programme.title: Dr. Panda S1 & S2 - EP 43

programme.title: Helen Dorn: Breathless
programme.desc: In an illegal arms case, three men, including two policemen, are dead. Mattheisen reveals a radical right-wing conspiracy, and suspects a mole. However, he is shot dead with Inspector Dorn’s weapon, while Dorn is found at the crime scene with no memory.

programme.title: The Little Comrade
programme.desc: During Stalinist tyranny, 6-year-old Leelo’s mother is sent to a prison camp. Haunted by her mother’s last words telling her to be a good kid, Leelo vows to be on her best behaviour in the hope that it will bring her mother back.

programme.title: Murder by the Lake - Procession
programme.desc: Marlene Stöhr is shot by a crossbow during the legendary “blood procession” with over 3000 horses and is on life support. Right before she was shot, she saw a precious racehorse presumed dead years ago. Two detectives are called to investigate.

programme.title: Once Upon A Time In Calcutta
programme.desc: Having just lost her daughter and disillusioned with her marriage, Ela decides to start an independent life of her own. Unable to secure a housing loan, she uses her boss, the owner of a ponzi scheme, to get what she wants.

programme.title: Helen Dorn: A Little Bit Of Freedom
programme.desc: Haunted by a missing boy's case from 14 years ago, Helen Dorn recently discovers a lead linking to the alleged perpetrator, Ron Faber. Dorn immediately heads for Hamburg when she learns that Faber was apprehended with a deceased Chinese boy in his van.

programme.title: A River Within
programme.desc: Five women with their own personal struggles travel to the Orange River for their “Adventure Therapy”. When things go awry in their river rafting adventure, their survival instincts kick in forcing them to dig deep.

programme.title: The Second
programme.desc: An author's success following the release of her celebrated erotic memoir is threatened when her best friend and muse reveals the truth behind the memoir's provenance, igniting an incendiary tale of sex, lies and betrayal.

programme.title: Celeste
programme.desc: Living in the lush rainforest of Northern Queensland, a retired opera diva prepares for one final performance. Her late husband's son Jack arrives, haunted by the past, only to discover that Celeste has one last request for him.

programme.title: Keeper
programme.desc: Maxime and Mélanie are 15 and in love with each other. One day, Mélanie learns that she is pregnant, and after much convincing from Maxine, they decide to become parents.

programme.title: The Deep
programme.desc: March 1984, a few miles off the south coast of Iceland, a fishing boat sank with all its men. One of the crew members miraculously survived. After six hours in the ocean, the exhausted man is washed ashore, only to find himself on a deadly lava field.

programme.title: Masha
programme.desc: Masha has grown up between the boxing ring and the streets of her provincial Russian town. Her closest friends, young gangsters who are loathed by the entire town, love and protect her. And suddenly the cruel truth about them is revealed to her.

programme.title: Exit
programme.desc: Thomas has it all: family and career at its best. But when his company’s most lucrative deal ever is about to close, something goes terribly wrong. He is arrested for the murder of his business partner when his fingerprint is found on the murder weapon.

programme.title: Black As The Snow 2: Dead At The Summit
programme.desc: An SUV races over the cliffs into the depths - the driver is killed instantly. The dead man was apparently involved in a robbery but there is no trace of the loot. French Officer Vivier and Swiss Captain Meyer once again team up to solve the mystery.

programme.title: We Look The Same
programme.desc: In this witty short about racial and culture crises, a French-born Chinese store assistant is faced with a conundrum. A Chinese tourist needs to use the store’s restroom but that’s against the rules. Is compassion worth the risk of losing one’s job?

programme.title: Kill Pinochet
programme.desc: Three unlikely assassins dream of doing the impossible: kill Chilean dictator Augusto Pincochet. On a Sunday afternoon in 1986, a Physical Education teacher, a Psychologist Tamara, and a football enthusiast, sought to rewrite the future of Chile.
